mapper.select: select a.id,a.project_no,a.project_name,a.project_authorize,a.project_note,a.project_produce, a.examine_note,a.createUserId,s.username as createUserName,a.output_remark, a.project_type, a.project_business,c.contract_business,c.user_name,c.user_phone, p.project_charge,p.execute_standard,p.work_note,p.work_require,p.safe_require,p.project_begun_date_time, p.project_work_date,p.project_quality_date,p.project_output,p.project_workload,p.project_writer, w.work_load,w.data_name,w.brief_summary,w.technical_disclosure_note,w.check_suggestion, q.quality_note,q.quality_score from project a LEFT JOIN project_contract c on c.contract_no = a.contract_no LEFT JOIN project_plan p on p.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN project_work w on w.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN check_quality q on q.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN sys_user s on s.user_id = a.createUserId where a.project_no = #{projectNo}

select a.id,a.project_no,a.project_name,a.project_authorize,a.project_note, a.examine_note,a.createUserId,s.username as createUserName,a.project_produce, a.project_type, a.project_business,c.contract_business,c.user_name,c.user_phone, p.project_charge,p.execute_standard,p.work_note,p.work_require,p.safe_require,p.project_begun_date_time, p.project_work_date,p.project_quality_date,p.project_output,p.project_workload,p.project_writer, w.work_load,w.data_name,w.brief_summary,w.technical_disclosure_note,w.check_suggestion, q.quality_note,q.quality_score, project_group.short_date_time,project_group.last_date_time,work_group.name as groupName from project a LEFT JOIN project_contract c on c.contract_no = a.contract_no LEFT JOIN project_plan p on p.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN project_work w on w.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN check_quality q on q.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN sys_user s on s.user_id = a.createUserId LEFT JOIN sys_user on sys_user.useraccount = p.project_charge_account LEFT JOIN project_group on project_group.project_no = a.project_no LEFT JOIN work_group on work_group.id = project_group.group_id where a.project_no = #{projectNo} and work_group.head_id = sys_user.user_id
